website_summaries.verdict: This heavy-duty air mover has a compact footprint, but it covers a large area and will dry your carpet quickly.
pros: Runs quietly for the amount of air it is putting out
cons: A few have questioned the product's durability and suitability for regular use

customer_reviews.title: OVERHEATS!
customer_reviews.text: While the unit operated as intended for the first year, there is not enough airflow to keep the motor sufficiently cooled and after a couple hundred hours of total combined use, which is not much, it began to engage the thermal protection and shut down the unit for 5-10 minutes at a time. Now it can only be ran on low where it shuts down every 10 min or so. I suspect the wingdings are failing with every use as it heats up. I highly recommend another manufacture as I see another user is having the same effects. I went ahead and went back to the axial style from mounto and xpower...far superior.
customer_reviews.author: M D.

customer_reviews.title: Had me going like a turbo jet
customer_reviews.text: As of this review has literally been running for 3 weeks straight. Not even a slight shake. If the last one I got fro amazon was a gremlin this is the rools Royce of air movers. You turn it on and it moves air and continues to do so until you shut it off
customer_reviews.author: B. Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Wow serious power . well balanced overall  review by Dr. Tasso Pappas
customer_reviews.text: We bought this used for the warehouse deals, and as always from Amazon fulfillment not disappointed in the cost or product. It is powerful and overall acceptably quiet for this level of power. Only small issue is a few times, less then 5%, I have gone out to the garage and found it has rotated. It is powerful and the floor is epoxy coated and a little wet so there is little doubt with that much force it torques a little. Not disappointed with the power, CFM, drying power on a wet garage floor or even the sound.
customer_reviews.author: tasso pappas

customer_reviews.title: Failed to Start After First Use
customer_reviews.text: The unit received was tripping the circuit breaker right out of the box. At first I thought I had a bad breaker because it would run on another circuit, however the second time I used it it would not even start, I would try to start it then tripped the circuit breaker. It is frustrating because I really need this to do some work, it did move quite a bit of air while it was working, however failing after the first use is unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Harris

customer_reviews.title: Durable fan
customer_reviews.text: We use these in a large factory for cooling materials. They have been running constantly for 6 months and still run like new. Several departments have requested these fans to cool personell as they move a large volume of air, and at a distance of 25 feet, cooling effect is still realized. The air they move remains in a pretty tight 'cone', at 15 feet it is still only about 5-6' in diameter. At 25', the velocity is much lower, but instead of a cone, it it a lighter 'wall' breeze. These fans (we have about 10 in use now) are really great to cool down the shop!
customer_reviews.author: J. Bilik

customer_reviews.title: Very Powerful 3 year review
customer_reviews.text: Very Powerful fan can tear a carpet apart, Better for glue down carpets. Update still works great outstanding fan to dry cement floors and such. This is a 1 hp fan, I have a customer who bought one for his apartments this fan pushes the bedroom carpet across the room and shredded it. 3-year review still powerful but I did have to work on it the bolt holding the cage broke I had to drill and retap the bolt to hold the cage.
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: Great dryer for the price
customer_reviews.text: Almost forgot I had bought this after Hurricane Irene. It has come in handy over the past year in drying out our basement after flooding. The price was right and the blower was strong enough to 'bend' around corners between the basement wall and wall paneling (we didn't have an opening on one side). We also used to dry out torn out wall to wall carpet. This will be used in the future to dry paint, future flood repairs and other projects with fast drying needs. Only reason it doesn't get five stars is because it's an energy hog.
customer_reviews.author: lmk5

customer_reviews.title: Worked great at first
customer_reviews.text: Worked great at first. I use this fan on a daily basis for flooring. I am a flooring installer. This help with floor patch drying quickly, carpets drying quickly after I shampoo them, etc. It has an amazing blower. The problem is that the feet came off almost immediately and so now it just spins in circles on high mode. Would not buy again
customer_reviews.author: Mandaree Graham

customer_reviews.title: Powerful Blower that Gets the Job Done !!
customer_reviews.text: Purchase this blower for my newly remodel room. The large and powerful CFM dry our washed carpet, and paint in no time and I also use it to draw new paint smell out. I also use this blower to keep the air circulate in my garage for this hot summer. The noise level on this unit is a little higher then expected, but for a blower that generate this much air and CFM it would be acceptable. Would recommend this multi function blower to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Great product, really moves air
customer_reviews.text: Very long cord, moves a lot of air. Can be placed flat or at an upward angle. May need to put support around it as it creates a significant amount of air flow on high and can move a bit on really smooth surfaces like wood floors. Great product for the money, would absolutely buy another one if needed. Used it to dry under house after significant spring rains and worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Tim T

customer_reviews.title: It blows.
customer_reviews.text: It isn’t balanced very well and the switch didn’t take long to break. It moves plenty air as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Yeehaw

customer_reviews.title: Overall not a good fan
customer_reviews.text: A little more noisy than my ShopVac fan, but not much. Vibrates some, may need to exchange it. Not too heavy, The fan speed switch really didn't make much difference In air flow, which was mediocre at best. Buy the blue ShopVac. Much better. OH! And it died WAY too early...
customer_reviews.author: PigPen4x4

customer_reviews.title: plenty of power for the price
customer_reviews.text: had a toilet overflow.drenched ceiling below toilet, aimed blower at wet dry walled ceiling. dryed it out before any damage other than staining,also wetted hard wood floor, fan dryed it out pronto, very minimal damage, hard to find a big selection of fans at the big hardware superstores. very pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: DOPHE

customer_reviews.title: Yes you want this fan for your foam machine (or for just moving air)
customer_reviews.text: Blower wheel is a little out of balance and it can move around a little while running on high (yeah, its minus a star worthy) but this thing really moves some air. Nice cord of good length (~25 feet? i think officially its 7.5 meters?), decently easy to carry with the handle position, and it comes with the soft half of velcro riveted to the outlet for a filter or a bag if you're making a foam machine
customer_reviews.author: Mish

customer_reviews.title: Moves a LARGE volume of air. The only reason ...
customer_reviews.text: Moves a LARGE volume of air. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because the switch is on front instead of on the side. This prevents you from inverting the fan to point down into a subfloor area beneath a screeded wood floor.
customer_reviews.author: tth

customer_reviews.title: Damp basement solution
customer_reviews.text: We had some local flooding that had us renting one of these from a local rental place, but we finally decided it was worth the cost to just have our own. All carpet dryers are loud, and this one is no exception, but it is every bit as good as the commercial steel encased one we rented. It dries carpet (w/o pad) quickly. This is a quality item.
customer_reviews.author: C. V. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Powerful carpet and room dryer
customer_reviews.text: Powerful carpet and room dryer....nice to have on hand after flooding or carpet cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Keli McMillen

customer_reviews.title: Carpet Saver
customer_reviews.text: Bought this due to a terrible flood we had here in Sioux Falls and got water in my basement. Usually just rent one from our local Menards but the whole town was flooded and didn't want to have to wait to rent one so o decided on this one due to it being 1 hp vs some of the other models. This thing blows!!! Turned it on and it about knocked me on my butt! Best investment and not hoping to have to use it again, but if I do I will be sure the carpet will dry quick!
customer_reviews.author: Cody Waugh

customer_reviews.title: Very Low Quality
customer_reviews.text: Noise is low for such a powerful blower and it moves an enormous quantity of air. However the build quality is dismal. The housing shows a fair bit of handling and scuffing (is this really a "new" item?). The blower wheel is cocked about 1/2" and the outer rim of the squirrel cage is bent in two places. Multiple balance weights were added to accommodate the runout which shows that this is "factory approved", not subsequent damage. I'll be returning this.
customer_reviews.author: Small Business Owner

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: It dried my carpet quickly. The three settings to me appear close together in output.
customer_reviews.author: VetintheWest

customer_reviews.title: Good fan.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. I bought this to make a foam machine for a party. Youtube has the directions. Thanks Jeff! Anyways, no complaints. Plug it in and it works well. I can't comment on how well it dries, just on making bubbles.
customer_reviews.author: bahhhoo

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful good for home use does not have a pass though ...
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful good for home use does not have a pass though outlet like some others draws alot of amps if you need to hook up a few of them up control knob fell off. Not constructed for regular use
customer_reviews.author: YKA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The air mover was all I expected, and was quickly shipped. A pleasure to do business with. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great air mover so far - I use it several ...
customer_reviews.text: Great air mover so far - I use it several times a week in my business. I recently had the 3 speed on/off switch break and I called Airfoxx's customer support line. The call was answered live, the problem was described, and since I was still under a one year warranty, a new replacement switch was shipped out to me within two hours of my initial call. Unbelievably excellent customer support - very rare these days. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Harriman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, its like it was made for foam
customer_reviews.text: With this one you no longer need epoxy to paste the other end of the velcro since it already has velcro securely riveted on it.
customer_reviews.author: Ace

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful
customer_reviews.text: This thing will blow your clothes off. I love it. Works great. However there was no manual included though, so am not sure what the cloth-like band around the nozzle is for.
customer_reviews.author: Dale D. Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Love 'em.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 6 of these to dry out flooded homes. These things are BEASTS. Love 'em.
customer_reviews.author: mAndrew

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fan moves a lot of air and is a high quality product
customer_reviews.author: Doug Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Moves a lot of air, not as loud as ...
customer_reviews.text: Moves a lot of air, not as loud as you would think (I think that should be somewhat expected). Would reccommend to anyone looking for this type of carpet dryer/air mover.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Detwiler

customer_reviews.title: This product blows
customer_reviews.text: I've been running this blower at high speed for 2 weeks straight in order to dry out a flooded crawl space. It's doing a great job. About another week should do it. It cost $140/week to rent a blower, so by the time I'm done I'll have saved $150 plus own the blower. Great deal.
customer_reviews.author: thawstone

customer_reviews.title: this one is fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: You do not want to have to buy this product (flood), but if you need an air mover, this one is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne the Savage

customer_reviews.title: Awsome
customer_reviews.text: works the best of all I have tried. That is a bunch. Worth every penny. Just wish it came with wheels
customer_reviews.author: Midnight65

customer_reviews.title: Best CFM for the Buck
customer_reviews.text: This thing moves a lot of air. Surprisingly not too loud. After doing some research this seemed to move the most air for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Michael I.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Love the design, the construction and the power. Well built product that perfectly suits my needs. I recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.author: John C. Mcmarlin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband works outside and he loves this fan! It is definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked great while it lasted. 3 months and motor out.
customer_reviews.author: Event S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent air mover. It's really powerful and dries the carpet faster than my other blowers.
customer_reviews.author: scrub

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described....
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly as described. We use it every day - and we will be getting at least one more shortly.
customer_reviews.author: John Allin

customer_reviews.title: very nice product.
customer_reviews.text: One of the most powerful and reliable ones on the market. very nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Pushis

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Does the job and then some. Would recommend to anyone in need of heavy duty drying. Great Product! Great Price!
customer_reviews.author: Jones Indoor Maintenance LLC

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not good product only works on speed 3, 1 and 2 dont work! Dont buy this item!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: MMDJ

customer_reviews.title: not for clearing dust
customer_reviews.text: switch is exposed to dust from the inside and gets stuck and broken right away.
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Unit was noisy, sounds like the blade was rubbing on something and also it danced all over the floor. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: rocman

product_meta.title: Air Foxx AM3450a 3/4 HP Mover/Dryer Air Blower, 20.5x19x21.5, Black
product_meta.description:
Style:3/4HPThe Air Foxx AM3450A is an air blower, mover and dryer that serves multiple purposes. With its high quality 3/4 HP motor that delivers up to 3450 CFM, it is often label as the blower with the "best bang for the buck. " Like its big brother, the AM4000A, the AM3450A is most commonly used for carpet and floor drying, but with its versatile housing, it can be positioned to dry walls, ceilings, or any area air circulation is needed. It is also designed to provide air circulation in an enclosed area. With its 3 speed motor and 3 way-position housing, this air blower can deliver just the right amount of airflow at any location making it the best air mover in its class.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The Air Foxx AM3450A is an air mover and dryer that serves multiple purposes. With its high quality 3/4 hp motor that delivers up to 3450 CFM, it is often label as the blower with the "best bang for the buck"! Like its big brother, the AM4000A, the AM3450A is most commonly used as a floor blower, but with its versatile housing, it can be positioned to dry walls, ceilings, or any area air circulation is needed. It's also designed to provide air circulation in an enclosed area. With its 3 speed motor and 3 way-position housing, this air mover can deliver just the right amount of airflow at any location making it the best air mover in its class.
feature_bullets: Multiple drying applications including carpet, walls, floors, cabinets, etc.
Rugged construction suitable for construction sites, warehouses, worksites and workshops
3 speed settings and 3 positions (level, 45 degrees and 90 degrees)
Built in heavy duty 25' cable with 3-prong 120V AC connection
Powerful 3/4 HP motor provides up to 3450 CFM

specifications.Warranty Description: 1 year limited manufacture warranty on all electrical parts.
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars82 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
